name: Movies of Janet Leigh Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Janet is best-known for the "shower scene" in "Psycho". Who else is a
stabbing victim of Anthony Perkins, in this movie?
questions.explanation:
Martin Balsam.

	Gavin and Miles are also in the movie, but it's Balsam who meets his fate at the top of the stairs.

questions.text: Janet starred with Charlton Heston and Orson Welles in "Touch of Evil". Where did the action of the movie take place?
questions.explanation:
Mexico.

	The movie is set in Mexico. It's often praised - I have no idea why.It's not that interesting.

questions.text: In "Manchurian Candidate" (the original), Janet plays Frank Sinatra's girlfriend. Where do the two meet for the first time?
questions.explanation:
On a train.

	Leigh befriends the falling-apart Sinatra on a train. The movie includes Laurence Harvey (in a starring role) and a young Angela Lansbury (playing a much older woman)in the cast, along with John McGiver, Henry Silva, James Gregory and Leslie Parish.

questions.text: What role does Janet play in "Harper"?
options: A suspect in the case that Paul Newman is investigating
questions.explanation:
Paul Newman's ex-wife.

	Lauren Bacall hires Newman to work a case. Leigh plays the ex-wife of private eye Newman. The cast includes Pamela Tiffin, Julie Harris, Arthur Hill, Robert Wagner and Shelley Winters.

questions.text: In "Bye Bye Birdie", which of these songs does Dick Van Dyke sing to Janet?
questions.explanation:
Put on a Happy Face.

	Van Dyke tries to cheer up girl friend Rosie (played by Leigh). The movie includes Ann Margret (early in her career) and Paul Lynde.

questions.text: Who starred with Janet in "The Naked Spur"?
questions.explanation:
James Stewart.

	This was a Jimmy Stewart western that also included Robert Ryan in the cast.

questions.text: Who starred with Janet in "The Vikings"?
questions.explanation:
Kirk Douglas.

	This adventure movie starred Kirk Douglas.

questions.text: Which movie did NOT include both Janet and Tony Curtis in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Prince Valiant.

	"Valiant" has Leigh, but not Curtis. "Falworth" (an adventure). "Houdini" (a biography) and "Lady" (a comedy) starred both of them.

questions.text: Janet starred in "Wives and Lovers". Who had a hit with the song?
questions.explanation:
Jack Jones.

	"Hey, little girl, comb your hair, fix your make-up, soon he will open the door ..." Good song.

questions.text: Which of these movies included Janet in the cast?
options: Not With My Wife, You Don't
questions.explanation:
Perfect Furlough.

	The other three included Tony Curtis (but not Janet) in the cast."Furlough" was a light comedy.
